==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Bita:''' What, are you just browsing too?
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Bita:''' I'm just an unimportant, ordinary dockworker.
::'''Bita:''' What's important is the cargo in my hand.
::'''Bita:''' See what this place is?
::'''Bita:''' It's Port Ormos!
::'''Bita:''' It's imported goods, don't you get it?
::'''Bita:''' Want to check them out?
::{{DIcon}} I'm just asking...
::'''Bita:''' Another one!?
::'''Bita:''' My boss wouldn't take a person like you even if you worked for free!
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Bita:''' Don't ask if you aren't buying.
{{Dialogue end}}
